subject: Soccer
Statistics
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Japan beat England, 2-1, to reach the Women’s World Cup final, but by another measure of team performance, expected goals, England came out on top, 1.48-0.87.
snippet: Japan beat England, 2-1, to reach the Women’s World Cup final, but by another measure of team performance, expected goals, England came out on top, 1.48-0.87.
